list_definition.definition: (a piece of) a narrow strip or band of cloth used for tying etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: bundles of letters tied with tape.

list_definition.definition: a piece of this or something similar, eg a string, stretched above the finishing line on a race track

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The two runners reached the tape together.

list_definition.definition: a narrow strip of paper, plastic, metal etc used for sticking materials together, recording sounds etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I recorded the concert on tape.

list_definition.definition: to fasten or seal with tape

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She taped up the cardboard box.

list_definition.definition: to record (the sound of something) on tape
